game_description: Grapple. Shoot. Score. Master the vertical combat. Join Discord: https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC (you can notify others to play) Grapple Tournament is an arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You can enjoy complete 3D movement freedom by running, double jumping, wall jumping, climbing and using your grappling hook in an alluring stylized world. Fight with more than 12 multifunctional weapons. Plasma pistols, revolvers, energy rifles, shotguns and rocket launchers await your command. Use them in one hand, two handed (with secondary fire) or dual wield for increased damage. What is your tactic? Mobility or firepower? If all else fails you always have your energy blade and bow on your side. Play multiplayer matches solo or with your friends. Party up and fight in various game modes on maps that were created with verticality in mind. Against players or bots. To complete the experience prepare for a practice range, drone challenges, customizations and more.
review_2: I love this game. Everything about it is great it just needs more recognition. So please people get this game and give it the recognition it deserves🙏 You won’t be disappointed I guarantee it.
review_3: I purchased this game over 8 months ago and all they have done is add an embarrassingly crap firing range. The servers just have tumble weed blowing by and is impossible to find any players. I tried for months to get a real game going and the developer says the servers are fine but if anyone does their homework, the servers are not fine and tons of other people say the same. It’s an absolute ghost town even on discord and the developer says to try to join at certain times because maybe there’s 3 players on sometimes at 7pm in my region LMAO. Go on discord and see for yourself. Anyone there just talks trash and doesn’t play the game or the developer just talks to themselves lol. Any multiplayer server should be swarming with players, and all I ever got was an excuse from them why it’s not popular “but watch out it’s going to be huge” they say haha thumbs down Here come the excuses…. | v
review_4: Good game especially if you like quake 3 or unreal tournament but where’s the people only bots
